original_text: Merchants must not store sensitive authentication data after authorization.
goal_description: Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization.
subject: Merchants

original_text: All cardholder data must be protected in accordance with PCI DSS requirements.
goal_description: Protect cardholder data in accordance with PCI DSS requirements.
subject: Merchants

original_text: Merchants must implement multi-layered security controls to protect cardholder data.
goal_description: Implement multi-layered security controls to protect cardholder data.
subject: Merchants

original_text: Account data compromise investigations must be completed within 10 business days.
goal_description: Complete account data compromise investigations within 10 business days.
subject: Merchants

original_text: Compromised accounts must be reported to Visa within 3 business days of discovery.
goal_description: Report compromised accounts to Visa within 3 business days of discovery.
subject: Merchants
